*  Nothing

Removes
*  Nothing

## [4.0.4] - 2020-03-11

*  Nothing

Removes
*  Nothing

## [4.0.1] - 2020-01-20

Fixes
*  Over rendering
*  Runing onChange too often

Adds
* typescript definition

Removes
*  Nothing

## [4.0.0-beta] - 2020-01-27
As of version 4.0.0 react live lock uses react hooks.

Minimum requirement(s):
*  "react": "^16.8"
